data.text: The original SD Trib article profiling NK's "diabolical dictator with big glasses and even bigger hair," Kim Jong-Il https://t.co/on32LzXF97

Samsung wanted to bankroll Air Jordan's visit to NK. But his Airness "respectfully declined."
https://t.co/uV2kHUwqob
Strahan will "respectfully decline," just like Michael Jordan did back in 2001. People forget Jordan was the one originally sought by NK.
